casebody.data:
CORTLEY FABRICS COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AETNA CASUALTY & SURETY COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 289, Docket 26040. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued April 12,1960. Decided April 12, 1960. Max J. Gwer'tzman, New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. McCarthy & McGrath, Herman J. McCarthy, New York City, for defendantappellee.

Before SWAN, CLARK and FRIENDLY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed in open court.
